website_summaries.verdict: Purina Muse is a simple solution to the grain-free cat food problem, and it excels by adding pumpkin for natural antioxidants and eggs for extra flavor.
pros: Includes healthy ingredients like egg, pumpkin, and spinach

customer_reviews.title: Maxwell loves it and Purina has discontinued 4/2020
customer_reviews.text: Yesterday I received word Purina discontinued this food. Today, Purina's email confirmed it. This will make Max very unhappy because Max the incredible cat likes it. As his caretaker, companion and partner in the house I am sad. I've spent piscoodles of money finding a quality product for my guy only to have it rejected. One was even $50 for a 12 oz. bag by Dr. Xxxxx who Max pushed away both wet and dry. When I put out this bag of Muse he scoffed it right up. Max's mommy is sad...very sad.
customer_reviews.author: SharonSuds

customer_reviews.title: 2nd bag cat won't eat
customer_reviews.text: Cat originally like it so I bought a 2nd one. Now I'm very worried because she's not eating and not acting like herself. Now we may end up having to take her to the vet. So regret switching brands.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Muse cat grain free dry cat food.
customer_reviews.text: Must change the outcome, after refusing to try Muse, I took away the other cat food , and the result was BAD, they tried it, and didnt quite clear the bowls of Muse and vomited all over the place... I wanted them to try Muse, because the ingredients looked good....this is has been a disaster for them and me. ... Never again!
customer_reviews.author: anniecat

customer_reviews.title: A nice in-between.
customer_reviews.text: I have a very, very picky cat. A kitty who is bottle-fed, so some of you may know what that means. The chicken version of this is the only dry food he will eat. I would have no problem with purchasing the more expensive food, but this is a nice in between. Not the cheap stuff from I would have no problem with purchasing the more expensive food, but this is a nice in between. Not the cheapest but not the most expensive. The ingredients are about as good as you will get for this price point. I have no issues with my fur baby munching on this all day.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: My cat has had horrible diarrhea since he was a kitten which we got ...
customer_reviews.text: I have been using the chicken flavor for the past 4 months and it has been a God send. My cat has had horrible diarrhea since he was a kitten which we got from a shelter. I would have given it 5 stars but i think it is kind of expensiv. I have tried all different kinds of food and this is the only one that does not give him diarrhea. I must also add I give him a half can of nuemans own organic beef wet cat food a day too.thank you purina for making this. I will be trying the salmon flavor as well.
customer_reviews.author: courtney

customer_reviews.title: RANCID CAT FOOD SHIPPED!!!  PRODUCT EXPIRED TWO MONTHS BEFORE PURCHASE.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two bags that were dated to expire in February. We purchased in March. Pet foods with animal fat in them or other oils go rancid when old and are extremely toxic. It will kill fish. Cats throw up a lot...in my case. I finally figured out her food was bad after 3 days of vomiting! Amazon; don't ship food that's close to the expiration date! Consumers; always look at the date when you get it. Don't make the mistake I did.
customer_reviews.author: Angela G

customer_reviews.title: HAVE REORDERED SEVERAL TIMES NOW!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 babies really take to this formula (chicken) and as their mom I feel it’s up there enough in quality for a dry food offering where they don’t just sniff and walk away—we’ve tried and rejected some real expensive brands. Cats are carnivores after all so raw or wet food is optimal, but that’s not always convenient, and some just like the variety. So far this is working for us, plus we’re experiencing much less upchucking from our repeat offenders which is always a good thing! My one complaint/feedback is a cat food product of this price point should open easier and have a ziplock closure to keep fresh. 😻
customer_reviews.author: Patricia M

customer_reviews.title: Please help: my cat is now an addict.
customer_reviews.text: My 14YO cat who only eats dry food and now only likes salmon flavored food is now a total junkie hooked on Muse. When the bag arrived I opened it to see if she would deem it tolerable and filled a small container after giving her a few pieces. The next morning she kept meowing at me in her cranky old lady, raspy way and WOULD NOT STOP until I gave her a hit of Muse. When I refill the container, she snatches a mouthful and drops it on the floor to eat a bite at a time. Apparently it’s *that* good.
customer_reviews.author: K. Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Meowyum....
customer_reviews.text: TDC is usually a picky eater, & rarely finishes anything. She's a huge turkey & chicken fan, so when I came across this dry food that contained both, & seemed to have decent ingredients, I thought I'd try it....and.....she seems to really dig it, & devours every morsel. Just wish it were less expensive for such a small bag...even the Science Diet I used to purchase was less expensive. A concern is, Amazon, as they often do, will discontinue selling it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Louis Wolfe

customer_reviews.title: I have no opinion. The cat, however, does.
customer_reviews.text: I have absolutely no opinion on this food that would matter. I stumbled over this at the pet store when searching for a grain-free adult cat food to give my cat who was being transitioned off her super-expensive kitten food. Like any responsible cat owner, I mixed the two at about a 3:1 ratio only to have the cat pick AROUND the kitten food and eat all of this food instead, leaving most of the kitten food outside the bowl. I assume that means she enjoys this food. We're on our third bag since transitioning her, and she's happy, healthy, and still enjoying it.
customer_reviews.author: C. Aleo

customer_reviews.title: Cats got very sick
customer_reviews.text: Our cats got very sick from this food. We are still trying to figure out what ingredient(s) might have caused them stomach problems. Something is hidden in these ingredients because the product is made to look clean and natural. I would not suggest it to anyone. It's very sad that this company would make a product that makes animals sick but label it as clean/natural.
customer_reviews.author: winnbiz

customer_reviews.title: Great Choice for both Cats
customer_reviews.text: I switched my two cats over to this food from Blue Adult Weight Control Chicken & Brown Rice food. On the Blue food, my male cat had horrible gas constantly. I read some troubling things about Blue brand foods and their effect on urine crystals in male cats, so that motivated me to switch. Both of my cats seem to love the taste of Muse, and my boy kitty no longer has terrible gas! I didn't expect that to clear up with the food change, but it makes sense. This food has been working great for both my boy and my girl. Glad to have found this food.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: Really helped my cat's digestive issues
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat who has serious digestive problems and this food has greatly helped. While her problems have not been cured, she now goes about a month between episodes of not eating and being sick. Who knew a cat could get on the gluten free bandwagon!
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Transition from grain to grain free
customer_reviews.text: When my senior cat started to lose interest a senior indoor food I had fed her for many years I noticed that she would leave behind a pile of small pieces of kibbles. Concerned that she was losing her appetite and maybe had a tooth issue I purchased wet food which was readily consumed indicating it wasn't her appetite so I decided to try a grain free product that can go into an automatic feeder. Any concern I had of transitioning to this product was quickly alleviated, she ate every last piece and continues to do so a week later.
customer_reviews.author: azblue

customer_reviews.title: My two female cats LOVE the chicken recipe
customer_reviews.text: My two female cats LOVE the chicken recipe! They have shinier coats and less smell in the litter box. We also do the wet muse chicken and the combination seems to work great for them! Both cats are excited for supper again! When comparing ingredients to other grain free brands, I found the ingredients to be similar to the leading, more expensive brands. I highly recommend giving Muse a try! I hesitated when I saw the brand was Purina but they really raised the bar! Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Kylee

customer_reviews.title: My cat eats the crap out of this (I usually buy an organic
customer_reviews.text: Be careful when feeding this to your cat, as they are prone to overeating foods that are not protein-dense. My cat eats the crap out of this (I usually buy an organic, protein-rich kibble for her but they were out of stock, so I got this). I'm glad she'll eat it but judging from her behavior I'm guessing this stuff doesn't pack as much real meats as the more pricey organic brands.
customer_reviews.author: Nastasia Santana

customer_reviews.title: Two Paws Up
customer_reviews.text: Good heavens, what is in this food? My finicky eater thinks it's the best thing to ever happen to her. As soon as she sees me with the bag, she begins meowing loudly and prancing around. I first received a free sample of Muse, and I couldn't believe how my kitty kept going back to where the bag was digging for more so I bought her a bag. Her attitude about it hasn't changed, and now I have to watch how much I put out so she doesn't overeat, something she has never done before.
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: My Cats Love This Flavor!
customer_reviews.text: I found a sample size of Purina Muse, Chicken flavor with egg and pumpkin and my one cat with a delicate tummy loved it. His loose and smelly stools improved. Our local pet store stopped carrying this brand and I am glad to find it here with Prime shipping! Even my mother-in-law switched to this flavor for her two cats. They love it too.
customer_reviews.author: Nancianne

customer_reviews.title: Great Taste, Helps Bad Gas & Vomiting
customer_reviews.text: Both my young cat (1 yr) and elderly cat (14 yr) love this food. My young cat used to struggle with frequent gas that smelled terrible. I changed his food to this, after trying out several other brands, and have had no problems since. This has also seemed to help my elderly cat throw up her food less. I may be a crazy cat owner, but I also tried a piece of kibble myself and it is much more edible from my (albeit human) perspective compared to other brands I have tested with my cats, so I understand why they like it the best.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: My cat seems happy.
customer_reviews.text: My cat seems happy. She whines for more when the bowl isn’t empty, so I’ll take that as approval. My cat is a chonker though, so I can’t vouch for pickier cats. Ingredients seem good, and start with things that I can pronounce and would consider actual food. So that’s a definite plus
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Cats really like this food
customer_reviews.text: I was buying another grain free food for several years, but it was discontinued my Merrick. I tried this one and the cats love it. I originally switched to grain free because one of my cats got sick often with other foods that contained grains. I am so happy to have found my replacement on the first try! I hope Purina keeps making this food for a very long time!!!
customer_reviews.author: Ezra T

customer_reviews.title: Great cat food!
customer_reviews.text: This cat food is little more pricey, but holistic, grain free and healthy! My son ordered this, he has 6 cats! A few will only eat this and it’s getting harder to find...can’t understand why...please keep making this!
customer_reviews.author: Teri J

customer_reviews.title: High quality that cat loves
customer_reviews.text: I have a very finicky Maine Coon. If she doesn't catch it herself she usually won't eat it but she gobbles this up. It has a strong fishy smell. Vet looked at ingredients and says it's a good quality food.
customer_reviews.author: Litchfield Lady

customer_reviews.title: not for the faint of stomach
customer_reviews.text: Usually my cats have stomachs of steel if I suddenly switch them to new food--I've never had to gradually introduce it. Except this food because holy crap, both cats got SO sick when I switched them to this suddenly. That said--when I did it properly, they did adjust, and loved it. So, it loses a star because apparently there's something somewhat jarring to normally steel-stomached cats in it, but i can't give it a poor review by any means, since the directions DO say to gradually introduce the cats, and it was ultimately just fine.
customer_reviews.author: Rose E

customer_reviews.title: Muse Chicken w/ Egg Recipe
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for an insectivorous bird diet. It has quality ingredients and the perfect balance of nutrients. I mixed it with a layer pellet and ground finely for a rehab diet for insectivorous birds. Not its intended use but it's a great product. The stray cats also love it.
customer_reviews.author: Osiris

customer_reviews.title: Vomit for Days
customer_reviews.text: All three of my cats vomited after eating this. Normally they eat Solid Gold but a delivery is being rerouted due to us relocating. I figured this would be a good in between for a new flavor. I have never been so wrong.
customer_reviews.author: A_waiting

customer_reviews.title: Helped with allergy!
customer_reviews.text: My cat was having dry skin issues that were caused by an allergy to the food she ate since she was a kitten. I changed foods a few times.and this was an instant hit! She really enjoys it and it makes me feel good to give her something good for her long term! I would recommend this to anyone, especially picky eaters. But the larger size you will save money!
customer_reviews.author: Prettykittyeyes

customer_reviews.title: Made my cat sick
customer_reviews.text: I received this food from Chewy and my cat loved it. I ordered the exact same product - the kibble looks different, it made my cat vomit (he never vomits) and avoid his food dish as if it’s tainted.
customer_reviews.author: CMB

customer_reviews.title: Decent food but pricey- worth it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a senior cat who gets digestive issues this particular Putin’s brand seems to agree with my senior cat, no over eating, less vomiting I made sure to choose a product gluten free no corn no wheat very little fillers- this is a nice food product that seems to suit my senior cat- I’m on my third bag
customer_reviews.author: CosmicShopper

customer_reviews.title: seriously, miracle food, TMI review.
customer_reviews.text: I can't tell you how long it took, probably a year, of trying different foods, and dealing w massive diarrhea episodes with my kitty, to finally find one that he has solid poops with, he's a rare breed. please don't stop making this it's the only one that works. thank you muse
customer_reviews.author: kittymagik

customer_reviews.title: 4 paws up in a 4 cat home
customer_reviews.text: My cats [4 middle aged to elder former street kitties] are picky picky eaters and finding a quality food they will all eat isn't an easy matter. I tried a number of very expensive kibbles and some would eat them others wouldn't, but Muse Chicken and Salmon formulas are a favorite of all four my picky little fur darlings. I am delighted to find a food they like that has the quality I like.
customer_reviews.author: Ernie

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this
customer_reviews.text: One cat is allergic to chicken and I don't want to feed them grains, so I tried this food and my cats love it. It's crazy expensive at the pet store--and I can't find it in any other stores where I live--and very convenient to just get an order every month.
customer_reviews.author: JudyRLa

customer_reviews.title: Muse by Purina
customer_reviews.text: I got a sample of this product in the mail I put it in a bowl and my two cats ate it up right away. Went to buy it for my cats and couldn't find it. So I logged on to jet.com and found it so I ordered it. Now it comes in three different flavors and my cats eat it up all of the time. Great product.
customer_reviews.author: Donnam053

customer_reviews.title: Picky cat loves this!
customer_reviews.text: My cat tends to be picky and doesn’t like the healthier food that I buy him. He would rather have things like nine lives or Friskies which in my book is like Burger King for cats, straight junk food. But this is a healthy alternative that he loves every time!
customer_reviews.author: jaymi

customer_reviews.title: Grain free. Byproduct free. Good for your cat.
customer_reviews.text: This little guy is named Monkey, and he almost died like three times before he was 3 months old. His body has violent reactions to grains and byproducts, and he will dehydrate and not be able to move or function. Muse is one of the only foods I've found that agrees with him, and it's sooo much more affordable than the other brands he can eat. I'm so happy I found it!
customer_reviews.author: lit geek

customer_reviews.title: Loved by a picky senior cat
customer_reviews.text: My senior cat is beyond picky and will flat out quit eating altogether if he does not enjoy his food. I picked this item on a whim and have been rewarded. He LOVES this product! He comes running for meal times and acts like it is a special treat. This is now my go-to for Mr. Picky.
customer_reviews.author: a reader by choice

customer_reviews.title: Our two cats really enjoy this food - especially our girl who is quite ...
customer_reviews.text: Our two cats really enjoy this food - especially our girl who is quite the picky eater. We wanted to keep them on a grain free diet, so were glad to find that she likes the salmon egg and yogurt recipe. I would recommend this to other pet owners looking for a grain free diet. This is also less expensive on amazon than at petco.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: That my kitties love it and its grain free
customer_reviews.text: My kitties LOVE the Sailing with Salmon kibble, ..I've even attempted to mix in other meatier brands,.. they picked out and ate the Sailing with Salmon and left the other brand in dishes , .. so that's all they get for kibble now,.. they beg for it every day and it's gone within an hour or 2
customer_reviews.author: Kristy

customer_reviews.title: my cats love this food and it does not give them an upset stomach
customer_reviews.text: The best cat food for cats with sensitive stomachs. Trust me I have been through quite a bot off cat food and this one does not upset the cat's stomachs at all
customer_reviews.author: soccermom

customer_reviews.title: Five out of five cats approve!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm delighted all my cats love this food. My Siamese has a sensitive stomach and frequently vomits her food...not this stuff. Plus she needs grain-free due to food allergies. This food fits the bill and all five cats approve! Can't get a better recommendation than that! 😻😻😻
customer_reviews.author: Sonya Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Cats seem to enjoy it
customer_reviews.text: Cats seems to like this food. I actually use it as treats for them. I use a handful for them when them come begging and they clean it up.
customer_reviews.author: R. L.

customer_reviews.title: Is this product nearly 2 years old?
customer_reviews.text: This bag has a manufacture date (or is it a "best by" date?) of 08-24-2018. I'm hesitant to open the bag, give the age of it. I don't think it's eligible for return, so it may be squirrel food.
customer_reviews.author: 7Rider

customer_reviews.title: My cats love this food
customer_reviews.text: Looked for this and was excited to find it priced under $14, however whe I went to order again it went up $3 so it is no longer a better buy than what I can get in store locally with coupon, and Since I always have a coupon the will need to drop price here for me to reorder.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn

customer_reviews.title: Shipped 6 months over shelf life
customer_reviews.text: Great cat food but, mine was shipped a year after production.. Dry cat food and it's preservatives stay good up to 6 months.. I hope you don't puke or die Twinkies..
customer_reviews.author: John M....

customer_reviews.title: Gettin the big bag next time!
customer_reviews.text: ALL the kitties were eager to Chow down once I opened up the bag and let them savor the new cat food aroma. They all seemed to enjoy the added "Masterpieces" bits. Can't wait to let them try the salmon flavor tomorrow! :)
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: The only food my 16-year-old jerk face feline will eat
customer_reviews.text: My 16-year-old picky eater will only eat Muse. After trying literally every other expensive dry food on the market, from Merrick to Taste of the Wild, to Instinct, to Earthborn to Orijen. Muse is the only food he likes. Take it from a feline jerk, it's amazing!
customer_reviews.author: A

customer_reviews.title: My 19 year-old kitty loves this
customer_reviews.text: My kitty Precious has been eating this a few years. Started as "treat-food" in the evenings, but when she wasn't interested in much food, she still loved this. Been free-feeding Muse chicken along with quality wet food for couple years now. Managing to keep good weight, kidney values almost normal in kidney disease Precious. No guarantees, but my kitty has benefitted from Muse.
customer_reviews.author: Cora Eldhart

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: Actually my cat loves it and I love that he loves it. Grain free dry cat food is not that easy to find plus at a very affordable price. This is the 2nd bag I have gotten and I foresee buying more in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Mary D.

customer_reviews.title: Kitty is fat and happy!
customer_reviews.text: The only dry food my rescue kitty will touch. He's a senior with few remaining teeth, but has no trouble with these kibble. He's finally started gaining weight, and looks much more healthy since switching to Muse.
customer_reviews.author: Anonymoose

customer_reviews.title: Cat crack in a bag
customer_reviews.text: We originally received this as a sample through Pinch-Me. This food must taste absolutely delicious to cat! We were able to use it as a treat when we first received it. Our oldest cat is quite picky, and he scarfs this up. A bonus plus, it’s also much less expensive than what he was eating prior.
customer_reviews.author: Hissing Kitty

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the changes you will see in your pet.
customer_reviews.text: We switched our cat to Muse Dry Cat Food a couple of years ago and she won’t eat any other dry food. Her coat has changed dramatically and she seems very content with it.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel P.

customer_reviews.title: Cats love this
customer_reviews.text: I have 4 cats and o ise these as trrstdy vats love the and I don't feel had giving them treats by the handful I put the in a jar so it looks like their getting treats And they are grain free
customer_reviews.author: Carla F. Stacey

customer_reviews.title: My cats love it
customer_reviews.text: I have fussy cats. I believe this to be somewhat higher quality than the old Purina, and they eat it. Its a sopplement mainly, i give them wet food 3x a day, but i think they would prefer this more.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Gurrola

customer_reviews.title: PURINA GRAIN FREE Salmon Cat Food
customer_reviews.text: Well my cats dove right into it...so they enjoy their new flavor of cat food. I just love to bring variety to my cats diet. I recommend this product to all cats lover... this natural Salmon, Egg and yogurt recipe is just healthy.
customer_reviews.author: Marion D Zottarelli

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got a trial size at a local retailer. My cat is super finicky so I was happy this brand offered it. My cat loves the salmon flavors offered in cans by this brand. I mixed this in with her current kibble and everyday that is the first kibble eaten. So, I was happy to see it here at a reasonable cost and bought the 9lb bag.
customer_reviews.author: PuddzeeTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: My cats love Muse chicken and Beyond chic and egg. I just feel better knowing they aren't eating grains. One of my feral rescues still has skin allergy problems but petwellbeing.com has herbal remedies for that.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The grain free has helped my cat.
customer_reviews.text: My cat really seems to enjoy this grain free product. I decided to try grain free on him after reading some cats have an allergy to the grain in cat food, and my cat was doing a lot of scratching. After switching him to Muse, the scratching has cut down considerably.
customer_reviews.author: wildflower

customer_reviews.title: He's a happy kitty!
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it so much that he now doesn't want to eat anything else. So...I mix it with his other food. He's a happy kitty!!!
customer_reviews.author: EleanorB

customer_reviews.title: Finally a cat food that settles on my kitty's stomach ...
customer_reviews.text: Finally a cat food that settles on my kitty's stomach. She is so much more healthier, her fir is so soft and she is so playful.
customer_reviews.author: Susie Brown

customer_reviews.title: Cat throw up
customer_reviews.text: My cat keeps throwing up after eating this. I'm not sure what ingredient upsets him but it's definitely this brand. I switch to Diamond natural and he's back to normal
customer_reviews.author: Cat paws

customer_reviews.title: My cats eat it
customer_reviews.text: My picky cats actually eat this. On my second bag, cats eat it up well, and it seems better for them (one I have gets sick easily, but this has been good for him). Hope they expand more into other flavors, but the chicken one is a hit for my cats.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: SUBSCRIBE AND SAVE
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love this food. The Salmon is their favorite Muse dry food. Very healthy and grain free. I have it come every other month on Subscribe and Save. Great price on Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: cdm13

customer_reviews.title: Cat goes nuts for this!
customer_reviews.text: My cat begs for this food every day. He’s a rescue but you wouldn’t know it, he’s quite picky! He has bitten holes in this bag to get to it. Not as expensive as some other brands and seems to be of decent quality.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Moore

customer_reviews.title: My cat is the pickiest cat and has over 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat is the pickiest cat and has over 5 dry food laid out for her every time. She always eats this one only.
customer_reviews.author: LF

customer_reviews.title: All 4 cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: My cats love this food! They're a little picky, but this they absolutely love. We subscribe and save, and I have to hide the bag before they tear a hole and help themselves :)
customer_reviews.author: Maisel

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it.
customer_reviews.text: Of all the different brands of kibble, my cats have chosen the Muse by Purina, Chicken, Egg and Pumpkin formula as their favorite, and I must say I'm grateful because the ingredients are healthy, compared with reading the labels of other high priced cat foods.
customer_reviews.author: jlbl1950

customer_reviews.title: Good food please bring back
customer_reviews.text: I need to know if this product has been discontinued!!! I feed my ferrets this food and they love it and have done so well on it that I would be very sad if I have to switch their food already! Im begging you to bring it back and help a furr mom out!!!! Please and thank you!!
customer_reviews.author: Ronald H Guy Jr

customer_reviews.title: Senior cat loves this food.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Muse chicken dry. Sofi loved that and canned too. Tried the Turkey and chicken and she is in heaven with this one. A bit higher in price but she is 9 and spoiled rescue cat! Would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: Muse dry cat food
customer_reviews.text: My cat can be pretty choosy but this seems to agree with him. What flavor is, I let him decide
customer_reviews.author: Lesley Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: She loves this cat food and it has yogurt can’t go wrong .
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Cat likes
customer_reviews.text: Finding a healthy product that my cat likes is very important, he approves of this product.
customer_reviews.author: Jody B

customer_reviews.title: The best cat food for my cat
customer_reviews.text: My cat always had constipation issues and when she started eating Muse she became much more regular. I am very glad to have found a food that works for her!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Kitties love it!
customer_reviews.text: This is our finicky cats new favorite. I am very picky about what I buy since we have Burmese and with their many health issues with this breed, I choose grain free cat food. They love the chicken but not as crazy about the salmon flavor. We have bought several bags since this one.
customer_reviews.author: T. Young

customer_reviews.title: My cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: I bought this due to its pumpkin ingredient to help my cat's digest and found out my cat really likes the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Leo

customer_reviews.title: Fine for young cat, older cat couldn’t keep it down
customer_reviews.text: My cat was eating it but threw up multiple times a day...as soon as a went to BLUE wilderness grain free weight control all the throwing up stopped...this is cheaper so I was hoping it would work...my younger cat ate it fine
customer_reviews.author: Jess Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Digestion
customer_reviews.text: The cats do not get sick or walk away from their food. They eat every morsel, so we don't have to throw out the food.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.text: I have a cat with a very sensitive stomach. Finally found this food that doesn't make him sick! Very satisfied!
customer_reviews.author: Kim Kamphouse

customer_reviews.title: THE BEST KITTY FOOD FOR PICKY EATERS!
customer_reviews.text: THE BEST FOOD for my healthy babies. Was the only food they would eat after being hand raised and fed on kitty milk and “people” chicken and fish. Thank the stars for this food!!!
customer_reviews.author: SewDarling

customer_reviews.title: My cats absolute favorite
customer_reviews.text: My cats favorite !!! And great price, not to mention delivered to my door
customer_reviews.author: JWC

customer_reviews.title: Great quality food. Reasonable price when bought on Amazon.
customer_reviews.text: All four of my cats love Muse. They all love the salmon but my male Maine Coons favorite is the chicken. This is the only brand of dry food I buy them anymore. We have tried all three flavors but their favorite is this one.
customer_reviews.author: JOYCE FLEMING

customer_reviews.title: Cat-Approved
customer_reviews.text: I received a sample of this in the mail and all of my cats loved it. I'm being a sneaky cat mom though and, to my cats, these are treats. So, I've not replaced their daily kibble with this, but I'm saving money on treats for sure.
customer_reviews.author: L. Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Didn't Work For My Cats
customer_reviews.text: It was cheaper than the Beyond grain free so I gave it a try. Within a day my cats were back to loose stools and vomiting. Had to give to a friend whose cats had no issues.
customer_reviews.author: The girls mommy

customer_reviews.title: Cats are happy
customer_reviews.text: Cats love this. i cannot personally vouch for the flavor but the overlords, uh the cats seem to really chow down on this stuff. The ingredients are not terrible either.
customer_reviews.author: betsy

customer_reviews.title: Kitty loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat loves it and it seems to keep him full a little longer than the other brands we have tried. He's the type that will meow and walk over your face in the morning if he's hungry and it has decreased :)
customer_reviews.author: Deep

customer_reviews.title: Best ever!
customer_reviews.text: Use this one plus the salmon version. My cats love it since switching to this brand and particularly muse their health is so much better!
customer_reviews.author: D. Wymer

customer_reviews.title: expired  freshness data
customer_reviews.text: Though I have no issues with the product itself. Due to sensitive stomach, it is the only brand my cat will eat. I would appreciate if sellers would check the expiration date before shipping the product. Purchasing online should not be any different as in a store. Products with expired dates should be removed from the shelf. Thank you Thank
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good amount of vitamins...
customer_reviews.text: has the minimum for protein...my cat is a lil older so wish it had more protein...like the shape...like that it's a better grade within the purina line...actually ordered it and didn't even notice that it was made by Purina...so actually shocked, but happy...never had tried this product before...so good choice...
customer_reviews.author: sheila mahoney

customer_reviews.title: Cat loves it
customer_reviews.text: My cat goes as crazy for this dry food as her wet food. Nice addition to have for her.
customer_reviews.author: LD23

customer_reviews.title: My cats LOVE the Muse!
customer_reviews.text: I feed 34 cats and everyone of them love Muse!!!! This is the only dry food that they will all eat heartily. The best part is that there is no grain or by-products so it is much better for them.
customer_reviews.author: NJN

customer_reviews.title: My cat seems to like it, I noticed she drinks more water with ...
customer_reviews.text: My cat seems to like it, I noticed she drinks more water with this food and it makes me wonder if there's so many changes sodium in it? Other then that it is decent food.
customer_reviews.author: Momoverseas

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and my cats love it
customer_reviews.text: Trying to keep my cats safe from urinary issues and other odd cat problems so I mix several good brands like this one into a larger container so each scoop is a mixture of good foods.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie  West

customer_reviews.title: Cat's seem to love this brand a lot !
customer_reviews.text: Wanted my cats to have a better diet - was told my a friend of my husband's that this is GREAT for them !
customer_reviews.author: B. Poirier

customer_reviews.title: My cats who normally snob a nose at their dry ...
customer_reviews.text: My cats who normally snob a nose at their dry food are devouring this and whining for more. We usually feed wet food in the morning then they get the option of dry, not until receiving this food have they ever emptied the bowl of dry food in between wet food feedings.
customer_reviews.author: RockyMtnHikeMom

customer_reviews.title: Very appealing
customer_reviews.text: My kitties eat this without hesitation, even the picky eaters. Their coats have become more shinier and softer. I don't even have to call them to come to eat, they just hear me getting the bag out and they come running.
customer_reviews.author: Connie J

customer_reviews.title: our cats give it 5 stars!!!
customer_reviews.text: We have 3 foods out for them and this one gets eaten twice as fast.
customer_reviews.author: mcjoy

customer_reviews.title: Kitty approved
customer_reviews.text: My 12 yr old cat loves the flavor, shape and consistency. She will not eat the tiny round catfood that so many brands have turned to.
customer_reviews.author: Joanie Leverett

customer_reviews.title: Cats love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 senior cats and this is the one food that all of them will eat. I free feed and they maintain a good weight and have a healthy coat.
customer_reviews.author: Karmalitta

customer_reviews.title: Tastes good
customer_reviews.text: My picky cats love it. Their weight is good and coats are shiny.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa E

customer_reviews.title: Our cats love it. We were feeding them Purina Beyond and ...
customer_reviews.text: Our cats love it. We were feeding them Purina Beyond and they never at it like they eat this. It is pricey but good for them.
customer_reviews.author: winkle3

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for my feral colony.
customer_reviews.text: My feral colony was not impressed, therefore neither am I. The raccoons and possums liked it however, but they'll eat anything.
customer_reviews.author: Marc1

product_meta.title: Muse Natural Grain Free Adult Dry Cat Food
product_meta.description: Style:Dry Food| Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:9 lb. BagCater to your cat's cravings by serving Muse by Purina Charmed with Chicken Natural Chicken, Egg & Pumpkin Recipe Plus Essential Nutrients with Accents of Spinach adult dry cat food. Real chicken is the #1 ingredient in this natural blend of flavors cats love, including ingredients like egg and pumpkin with accents of spinach. Made without chicken by-product meal, this Muse cat food shows your pet how much you care about what goes into her food, and because it has no corn, wheat or soy, you can feel good about serving it every day. Essential nutrients in this dry cat food help provide your adult cat with the complete meal she needs to explore her world every day, while its omega-6 fatty acids help promote healthy skin and a coat you'll love to cuddle up to. With delicious flavors like this chicken, egg and pumpkin recipe on the menu, it's hard for your cat to wait for mealtime. Place an order for this dry cat food from Amazon.com today to ensure you're not left waiting for your shipment.
feature_bullets: Real Chicken As the number 1 Ingredient
A Flavor Cats Love From A Blend Of Ingredients Like Chicken, Pumpkin, Egg, And Accents Of Spinach
Gluten- And Grain-Free Formula Contains No Corn, Wheat Or Soy
Made Without Artificial Colors, Flavors Or Preservatives For Natural Goodness
9 pound Bag - Muse By Purina Charmed With Chicken Natural Chicken, Egg & Pumpkin Recipe Adult Dry Cat Food
